remarks: Orthomodular law equivalent.  Remark in [Holland95] p. 223. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-2011.)
statement:
omllaw4.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
omllaw4.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
omllaw4.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
omllaw4.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
omllaw4 $p |- ( ( K e. OML /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .<_ Y -> ( ( ._|_ ` ( ( ._|_ ` X ) ./\ Y ) ) ./\ Y ) = X ) ) $.
